name: De Natuur en Milieufederaties
memberOrga: our member organisations include federations in the 12 provinces of the Netherlands: https://www.natuurenmilieufederaties.nl/jouw-provincie/
goal: NMF (short for Nature and Environment Federations) is a foundation that works towards green and sustainable provinces that are adequately prepared for a changing climate. With a strong independent division in each of the Netherlandsâ€™ twelve provinces, we are an important regional and local player in the field of sustainability. Together we support, stimulate and connect to more than 1.000 local organisations. In each province there is an active Nature and Environment Federation. Each of those federations work towards a society that: Uses as little as possible, but in any case green energy;  Protects and develops landscapes and nature;  Reduces her ecological footprint by making the economy circular
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy
euInitiatives: landbouw, stikstof, energiebeleid (duurzame energie), voedsel, circulaire economie, Natura 2000
